name: Fire screen (écran)
maker: Frame attributed to Georges Jacob, possibly by Pierre-Claude Triquet, or Jean-Baptiste-Simon Rode
description: Fire screen (écran); Frame attributed to Georges Jacob (French, 1739 - 1814, master 1765), possibly by Pierre-Claude Triquet (French, active second half of 18th century, master 1762), or Jean-Baptiste-Simon Rode (French, 1735 - 1799, master 1766); Paris, France; about 1785 - 1790; Walnut; 127 x 80 x 43.2 cm (50 x 31 1/2 x 17 in.); 88.DA.124; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: Fire screen (écran)
